query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticket_status_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticketId INT NOT NULL,
  oldStatus ENUM('aberto', 'em_andamento', 'enviado_dev', 'resolvido') NULL,
  newStatus ENUM('aberto', 'em_andamento', 'enviado_dev', 'resolvido') NOT NULL,
  changedBy INT NOT NULL,
  changedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ticket (ticketId),
  INDEX idx_changed_at (changedAt)
);

  newStatus ENUM('aberto', 'em_andamento', 'enviado_dev', 'resolvido') NOT NULL,
  changedBy INT NOT NULL,
  changedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ticket (ticketId),
  INDEX idx_changed_at (changedAt)
